thread.title: Busy Philipps partnered with Michaels to make these adorable Galentine’s Day crafts and we wish we could DIY with her
thread.title_full: Busy Philipps partnered with Michaels to make these adorable Galentine’s Day crafts and we wish we could DIY with her

author: Rachel Charlene Lewis
title: Busy Philipps partnered with Michaels to make these adorable Galentine’s Day crafts and we wish we could DIY with her
text:
Busy Philipps partnered with Michaels to make these adorable Galentine’s Day crafts and we wish we could DIY with her It’s almost the best day ever, Galentine’s Day , one of our favorite holidays of all time ! We’ve been busy trying to brainstorm ways to have the perfect Galentine’s Day celebration , and Busy Philipps partnered with Michaels to show us just how to do it. If you’re all about DIY, you’re gonna dig how Busy Philipps celebrates Galentine’s Day.
When it comes down to it, Busy Philipps celebrates Galentine’s Day with lots and lots of crafts. She kicks things off with some adorably sweet hearts that look so good we honestly want to eat them. 
Rachel Murray/Getty Images for The Michaels Companies 
Next step, homemade body scrub. Now that’s a rad idea! We never would have thought about centering crafts for Galentine’s Day, but we’re definitely feeling it for this year’s celebration. Rachel Murray/Getty Images for The Michaels Companies And what’s Galentine’s Day without loads and loads of sweets?! These simple cupcakes in a jar are perfectly liftable, and our mouths are watering just looking at ’em. We’ll take a dozen! Rachel Murray/Getty Images for The Michaels Companies 
Next, Busy shows off her hardcore DIY skills by getting out some fancy DIY tools and doing some leather work. Custom? We dig it! Rachel Murray/Getty Images for The Michaels Companies 
Top things off by making wreaths that are a little bit vintage, and a lotta bit coachella. We can’t lie: we’d have to make one for our heads and get at least one selfie. We can’t help ourselves! It’s so precious. Rachel Murray/Getty Images for The Michaels Companies 
And can we just talk about her Galentine’s Day outfit?! It’s totally grown up and yet SO cute, and we’re digging her colorful heart pins. Rachel Murray/Getty Images for The Michaels Companies 
Thanks for the Galentine’s Day inspo, Busy!
